task.title: View Data Categories
task.shortdesc: View the names of defined data categories on theData Sources page.

step.cmd: Open the Data Sources screen, by clicking the Data Sources icon. in the left navigation bar.

info.p: The Data Sources page opens showing the defined data categories.

result.p: If you are an administrator, you can also view data category names from the System Configuration Data Categories screen.

Open the System Configuration screen, by clicking the System Configuration icon. Then click the Data Categories tab to open the Data Categories screen. At the right side of the Choose Category to Edit field, click the drop-down list to see the list of defined data categories.
